name: Project Druid - 2D Labyrinth Explorer-
description: Find the key and solve the maze. Oh yeah stay alive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 Processor: P4, AMD Athalon Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: At leats 128 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Terrible game. Amateur. Not fun.  When you are on the menu screen you will be prompted to choose your language then go through 3 screens where each time you press space to continue and the screen slowly fades to black while you are forced to wait.  The game itself is a simple maze game with enemies that follow you around and when they touch you your health is drained in a continuous fashion as long as you are touching the enemy. The oblong collision boxes despite things not looking oblong will mean you get stuck on corners a lot and die.  When you die you have to press y or n to restart and if you choose n then you go back to the main screen and have to choose your language again.  I REPEAT DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. IT IS TRASH.
My friend gifted me this game.   I don't think they'll ever find the body.
Terrible controls + a Character that is way too slow=Bad Game  1/10
